headline: Is the Stock Market Open Today? Here Are the Trading Hours for Memorial Day.
summary: Memorial Day is here, and the markets have a lot to digest.  Global trade policy remains an ever-evolving landscape, with President Donald Trump pledging to drive consumers to buy more American-made goods by imposing taxes on U.S. trading partners.  It’s a day of remembrance and mourning, and is one of three days meant for honoring U.S. military personnel each year.
